titles.title: To require establishment of an Office of Territorial Affairs in each Executive department and each independent establishment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 1/6/2005--Introduced. Require the head of each Executive department and of each independent establishment to: (1) establish an Office of Territorial Affairs; and (2) appoint a Director of the Office of Territorial Affairs, who shall be the head of such office. Requires the Director to serve as the liaison to the territories with respect to implementation of the programs of the Executive department or independent establishment.
